item.title: Week 7 - Population Size per Region and State
item.description: Graph This is a bar graph that shows the population size per US region in 1975. The population sizes are arranged in descending order and offers a comparison between the sizes. Including Plots You can also embed plots. See Figure 1 for example: par(mar = c(0, 1, 0, 1)) pie( c(280, 60, 20), c('Sky', 'Sunny side of pyramid', 'Shady side of pyramid'), col = c('#0292D8', '#F7EA39', '#C4B632'), init.
